name: Unlock (Yuzikio)
description:
A micro-horror game that plays around with a few novel motions of basic fear concepts I hope it gives you a quick spook and chills.

The objective is to interact with all the points of interest to progress the story.

I look forward to your feedback and I hope it was enjoyable. :)

The controls are the standard WASD for movement.
For interaction you can use either E, F, X, Space.
